root.name: The Love Letter
root.description: The Love Letter came out of the 72-hour game jam, Ludum Dare 22. The theme of the jam was ALONE, so an idea was suggested for a game in which you tried to get away from all the people who keep bothering you. The unfinished build that came out of the Ludum Dare 22 won 1st place for Theme, and 10th overall.
